abstract: The network has lavished attention and promotions on the show, which has performed reasonably well in its 10 p.m. Monday slot — far better than anything NBC has tried in that time period in many years.

lead_paragraph: Undoubtedly with some sense of relief and satisfaction, NBC announced Thursday it would bring back “Smash” for a second season.

headline.main: NBC Renews ‘Smash,’ Its Much-Hyped Broadway-Based Drama
